issue.title: [CI] Enable ccache with MinGW builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5319](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5319). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
MinGW builds on AppVeyor have become quite slow. We should be able to enable ccache with them and use AppVeyor build caching to speed up some of those builds.
